name: Alter Ego (itch) (chemicahl)
description:
Directions: 

During cutscenes, click the mouse to advance the image. Otherwise, move around the room by clicking on the navigation buttons. Click on objects in the room to move closer or add them to your inventory. Click on objects in your inventory to select them, then click on another object to use the two objects on each other.

Note-in the web version, the cursor does not change to the object that the player selects, but the object is still selected and works as intended, it's just hard to tell what item is selected. In the Windows version, the cursor changes to show what item the player has equipped.
